Introduction
This topic contains information on processing payments to children after the surviving spouse’s remarriage, including
handling an overpayment created following the surviving spouse’s remarriage
appropriate award action in current-law pension and DIC cases following the surviving spouse’s remarriage
, and
an example of action taken on a remarried surviving spouse’s award
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
